statements: SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name FROM ImageData ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM ImageData WHERE image_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ImageData;
SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE image_name LIKE '%sun%';
SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name FROM ImageData WHERE image_id > 5 ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM ImageData WHERE image_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY image_name ASC;
SELECT image_id, LENGTH(image_data) AS data_length FROM ImageData WHERE data_length > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images FROM ImageData;
SELECT id, image_name FROM ImageData;
SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM ImageData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata WHERE metadata_key = 'type';
SELECT image_id, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name FROM ImageData WHERE image_name LIKE 'car%';
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata WHERE metadata_value NOT NULL;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM ImageData WHERE id >= 3 ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT i.image_name, m.metadata_value FROM ImageData i JOIN ImageMetadata m ON i.id = m.image_id WHERE m.metadata_key = 'author';
SELECT * FROM image_data;
SELECT image_url FROM image_data ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT label_name FROM labels WHERE label_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM image_labels WHERE image_id = 'a21f3215-c7b5-4a01-9612-70d98268caec';
SELECT image_id, label_name FROM image_data JOIN image_labels ON image_data.image_id = image_labels.image_id WHERE label_id = 'd3647505-9898-406f-b977-254b18f0312b';
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM image_data WHERE image_id = '9e2b4223-4e6d-497b-92d3-4b6db5b97768';
SELECT * FROM image_data ORDER BY image_url DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM labels WHERE name LIKE 'car%';
SELECT DISTINCT image_id FROM image_labels WHERE label_id = '4e241676-82d5-438a-b41c-8b27cc432a9b';
SELECT image_id, COUNT(label_id) AS label_count FROM image_labels GROUP BY image_id HAVING COUNT(label_id) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT image_name FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_format = 'PNG' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_size FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_name LIKE 'image%' AND image_size BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT image_name, image_format, created_at FROM ImageMetadata WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_format FROM ImageMetadata WHERE image_size > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT image_id, COUNT(*) AS num_labels FROM ImageLabels GROUP BY image_id HAVING num_labels > 2;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS num_categories FROM ImageCategories GROUP BY category_type ORDER BY num_categories DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT label_name FROM ImageLabels WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM objects ORDER BY object_name DESC;
SELECT label_text, confidence FROM labels WHERE confidence > 0.8;

SELECT image_url, category_name FROM images JOIN image_categories ON images.image_id = image_categories.image_id JOIN categories ON image_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE categories.category_name = 'Nature';
SELECT * FROM images JOIN objects ON images.image_id = objects.image_id;
SELECT objects.object_name, COUNT(labels.label_id) AS label_count FROM objects LEFT JOIN labels ON objects.object_id = labels.object_id GROUP BY objects.object_name;
SELECT image_url, label_text FROM images JOIN objects ON images.image_id = objects.image_id JOIN labels ON objects.object_id = labels.object_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(image_id) AS image_count FROM categories JOIN image_categories ON categories.category_id = image_categories.category_id GROUP BY categories.category_name;
SELECT label_text, confidence FROM labels WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY confidence DESC;
